name: gotta-get-you-onto-my-server
description: Provision virtual servers, the serverless way

scripts.package: npm ls --prod --parseable | grep node_modules | sed -e 's/.*node_modules/node_modules/' | xargs zip onto.zip -r onto.js package.json
scripts.deploy: wsk --apihost $npm_package_config_wsk_host --auth $npm_package_config_wsk_key action update onto-server onto.zip --kind nodejs:6 --web true

author: Lars Trieloff

deployToGit.commit: [ci skip] deploy build #$CIRCLE_BUILD_NUM to Adobe I/O Runtime
